scheduler.title: Scheduled Tasks
scheduler.prompt: Prompt (e.g., Tell me about NASDAQ, Dow Jones and major US stock news)
scheduler.noTasksHint: Add one using the "New Task" button above

settings.languageDesc: Select your preferred language for the Sancho interface.
settings.matrixPasswordHelp: Password for your Element X account. If you signed up with SSO (Gmail, etc.), use Access Token below.
settings.matrixTokenHelp: If signed up via SSO without password: Element Web → Settings → Help & About → Copy Access Token
settings.slackTokenHelp: Create a Slack App at api.slack.com/apps. Enable Socket Mode for App Token (xapp-...), and copy Bot Token (xoxb-...) from OAuth & Permissions.

profile.name: Name
profile.needGoogleCredentials: Please set Gmail Client ID/Secret in Settings > API first.

common.rateLimitError: API rate limit exceeded. Please try again shortly.

crypto.strategyHelpLlm: AI analyzes indicators (RSI, MACD, Bollinger, etc.) and decides BUY/SELL/HOLD. Requires confidence ≥ 70%. Take-profit is also decided by AI.
crypto.strategyHelpRule: Buy: 3+ of 6 signals (RSI<30, MACD>0, BB<0.2, Price>SMA20, EMA12>EMA26, Vol>Avg). Sell: 2+ of 4 signals (RSI>70, MACD<0, BB>0.8, EMA12<EMA26). Auto take-profit at +1.5%.

voice.title: Voice App
voice.description: Scan the QR code with your phone to have a voice conversation with Sancho.
voice.scanGuide: Scan with your phone on the same WiFi network
voice.networkWarning: Your desktop and phone must be connected to the same WiFi network.
voice.internetDesc: Enable to access from mobile data (4G/5G) or any network
voice.tunnelError: Failed to start tunnel. Please check cloudflared installation.
voice.scanGuideInternet: Scan with your phone (works on any network)
voice.tunnelFirstTime: First time may take a moment to download
